name: Creator's Dimension ALPHA
description:
Creators Dimension! A small indie game that lets you build, and destroy! Maketowns, animal farms, or even pig armies! Note this game is still in alpha so lots of things/bugs will be changed/fixed in the future.

For future updates, join our discord server! 

https://discord.gg/UMpEdUb

Help: To delete objects, hover over them and press "backspace." Blue icon= Starting Location
